A nice little gadget. I'm looking forward to using it.
Two fiery gadgets I get to take with me everywhere, I like it.
I have three incendiary gadgets with me all the time, I can feel their warmth.
A whole arsenal of incendiary goodies, I love it!
Should one person have this much firepower? I'm not giving it back either way!
I'm practically a human torch, incredible!
So many ways to set the world ablaze, I'm not sure if I can resist the temptation.
LanguageData.BM_PyromaniacDislikesBukkageModule.stage: I don't want to use these. Let someone else deal with fires.
LanguageData.BM_PyromaniacLikesFlameyTailModule.stage: Pyromaniac has incendiary turret tail module
It's great to be with a like-minded individual such as this little fellow.
An artificial enhancement for an artificial enhancement? What a horrible idea.
body purist has two modules installed
Another one? Is this really necessary?
body purist has three modules installed
This is completely unnecessary, I want this thing out of my body.
body purist has four modules installed
The line was crossed so long ago... I hate this.
body purist has several modules installed
This is a nightmare... I can barely recognise myself.
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.0.label: body modder has module installed
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.0.descriptio: An artificial enhancement for an artificial enhancement? That's genius!
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.1.label: body modder has two modules installed
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.1.descriptio: I like how this is shaping up, keep them coming!
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.2.label: body modder has three modules installed
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.2.descriptio: How many more can I install? Is there a limit? I sure hope there isn't.
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.3.label: body modder has four modules installed
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.3.descriptio: I'm truly becoming something more than human.
LanguageData.BM_BodyModderPleased.stages.4.label: body modder has several modules installed
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.label: brawler has ranged combat module
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerUnhappy.stages.0.description: Can I get something else instead?
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerUnhappy.stages.1.label: brawler has two ranged combat modules
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerUnhappy.stages.1.description: I have to carry these stupid things around. This sucks.
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerUnhappy.stages.2.label: brawler has three ranged combat modules
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerUnhappy.stages.3.label: brawler has several ranged combat modules
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerUnhappy.stages.3.description: What am I supposed to do with these?!
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerHappy.stages.0.label: brawler has melee combat module
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerHappy.stages.0.description: It fits my style, I like it.
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerHappy.stages.1.label: brawler has two melee combat modules
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerHappy.stages.1.description: These fit my style, I like them.
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerHappy.stages.2.label: brawler has three melee combat modules
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerHappy.stages.2.description: This much might not be necessary, but I'm not complaining!
LanguageData.BM_BrawlerHappy.stages.3.label: brawler has several melee combat modules
LanguageData.BM_GreedyGoldenModules.stages.0.label: golden module
LanguageData.BM_GreedyGoldenModules.stages.0.descript: This must've cost a pretty penny.
LanguageData.BM_GreedyGoldenModules.stages.1.label: two golden modules
LanguageData.BM_GreedyGoldenModules.stages.1.descript: So pretty! So shiny! So... valuable.
LanguageData.BM_GreedyGoldenModules.stages.2.label: three golden modules
LanguageData.BM_GreedyGoldenModules.stages.3.label: covered in gold
LanguageData.BM_GreedyGoldenModules.stages.3.descript: My body has got to be the most valuable and impressive thing here, as it should be!
LanguageData.BM_ChemicalHateModules_Drugs.stages.0.de: This thing is constantly pumping drugs into me, it's awful.
An implant is constantly producing drugs for me, I like it.
LanguageData.BM_ChemicalFascinationModules_Drugs.stag: An implant is constantly producing drugs for me, I love it.
LanguageData.BM_PyroUsedFirefoamModule.stages.0.label: Pyromaniac used firefoam module
